analysis.description:
EasyMineIco.setup (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#334-368) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(easyMineToken.balanceOf(this) == maxTokensSold())

Reentrancy in EasyMineTokenWallet.withdraw (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#186-209):
	External calls:
	- ! easyMineToken.transfer(withdrawalAddress,withdrawalAmount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#201-206)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalWithdrawn (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#206-208)

EasyMineIco.finalize (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-easyMineToken.burn(balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol)

Reentrancy in EasyMineIco.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#410-455):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(easyMineToken.transfer(msg.sender,tokensToReceive)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#450-451)
	- finalize() (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#453-454)
	External calls sending eth:
	- assert(bool)(msg.sender.send(amountRemaining)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#446-448)
	- assert(bool)(wallet.send(msg.value - amountRemaining)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#448-450)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#453-454)

Reentrancy in EasyMineIco.reserveTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#455-495):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(easyMineToken.transfer(reservationAddress,tokensReserved)) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#489-491)
	- finalize() (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#494-495)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#494-495)

Reentrancy in EasyMineIco.setup (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#334-368):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(easyMineToken.balanceOf(this) == maxTokensSold()) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#363-367)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/6/0x53ce47cbe7f2be0aecd086a70182a98c907d024d.sol#367-368)
